          use getInputSources() instead

          Only used when the intention is to draw the shapes using the stencil buffer..

          Only used when the intention is to draw the shapes using the stencil buffer.. 
org.mt4j.util.MT4jSettings.getScreenCenter()
          - use getWindowCenter() 
org.mt4j.util.MT4jSettings.getScreenHeight()
          renamed to getWindowHeight() since this doesent return the screen height, but the MT4j window's height 
org.mt4j.util.MT4jSettings.getScreenWidth()
          renamed to getWindowWidth() since this doesent return the screen width, but the MT4j window's width 
org.mt4j.components.visibleComponents.shapes.AbstractShape.getWidthXYVectLocal()
          this method should actually be private. Use getWidthXY(Transformspace.LOCAL) instead!

          renamed to hasBounds
